extendedInfo.description: Browser Switch is a tool that can open the Web page by another browser. This is the best tool for the user who use some browsers. (Opera,Dolphin,Firefox and more)You can switch a browser by a very easy operation.âWhen the Web page is seen, do you have such some experiences?â*The Flash page is not displayed well.  It is possible to display by other browsers or I want to try. *You want to open the page by another browser when reading the Web page is slow.*You are hesitating which browser to make a standard. You want to display the same page by various browsers and to compare browsers. *A standard browser is decided. However, you want to use another browser as the second candidate. *You want to confirm your layout of the blog and homepage by various browsers. âBrowser Switch is the best tool for you who has such worry. â[How to use]*You can select Browser Switch from "Share page" function of a browser used by installing this application program. *If you want to open the Web page by another browser, you will select Browser Switch from "Share page" of a browser. *Next, some installed browsers will be displayed. To open the Web page, you can select a browser. *You can decide a browser to open the Web page by the setting. *When URL is copied and Browser Switch is started from the notification bar, you can select a browser to open URL. It is the same as the case of page sharing. *You can select the application to be displayed in the notification bar by the setting.

reviews.title: Works well, simple
reviews.comment: Love Angel browser but can only google an address and it won\'t show animated gifs. Until it\'s perfect this switches to and from Opera Mini quickly and easily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This well kept secret of an app is awesome and a pleasure to use! Lets face it, all Android browsers seem to have random issues and when one browser stalls you there is usually another one that will get the job done! With Browser Switch, you can seamlessly switch to another browser on the fly with a couple finger presses and zero text input! Browser Switch has saved me tremendous time, and effort. A+++
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extremely Handy Utility!
reviews.comment: It cones highly recommended. It does exactly as advertised and is very useful for opening links in a browser of choice. Allows me to easily switch to Opera when I need to download something. I use the stock ICS browser for everything else.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Been looking for an easy way to do just this! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This is fantastic! Simple and does the job perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for an app to do what this does for forever. Works as advertised :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Kenneth Ward
